page.title: 01INVERINAN
page.content: Inverinan is 4 miles from Dalavich. Inverinan doesn't quite sit on the banks of Loch Awe.There are 11 houses in the area.The population of Inverinan is 16 adults and 3 children. There are 2 cottages that are used for holidays.There is a river running into Loch Awe called the river Inan.That is one of the reasons why Inverinan was built because there was a clean water supply.Out of the 11 houses there is 1 farm and 1 croft.There are a few fields round about Inverinan.There are forest walks that start across the road from my house.
